Generating vNIC Templates

To generate vNIC Template, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of vNICs in the textbox.

 3. Select the desired OS type from the drop-down list and click Add to generate Virtual Network Interface Card.

You also have the option to select the QoS Policy and N/W Control Policy for your virtual network interface. For more information, see Configuring Quality of Service Policy and Configuring Quality of Service Policy

Figure 5-8 Configuring VNIC Templates

 4. Click Save and Next to proceed further.
